media:group.media:title: “Boredom and the Bible” - Digital Disconnect (DID210012)
media:group.media:description:
Pleasure-seeking and the quest for more entertainment put the brain into what scientists call 'the pleasure trap' - boredom and unhappiness as a result of indulgence in addictive behaviors. How can we escape the pleasure trap?

entry.title: “Body and Soul“ 3ABN Today Bible Q & A (TDYQA210020)

media:group.media:title: “Body and Soul“ 3ABN Today Bible Q & A (TDYQA210020)
media:group.media:description:
What does the Bible mean when it mentions a soul? And what did Jesus mean when He said we should not fear "those who kill the body but cannot kill the soul." But rather "Him who is able to destroy both soul and body in hell" (Matthew 10:28)? Get answers to this question—and many more—on 3ABN Today's Bible Q & A with Jason Bradley, Jill Morikone, John Lomacang, and John Dinzey straight from God’s word.
Send us your Bible Questions! By email: BibleQA@3abn.org By text: (618) 228-3975
TDYQA210020 #Bibletopics

entry.title: “The Roots of Restlessness” | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 3 Q3 2021

media:group.media:title: “The Roots of Restlessness” | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 3 Q3 2021
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2021 quarter 3, lesson 3 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is “Rest in Christ” and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled “The Roots of Restlessness”. Join us every week for a fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
Matt. 10:34–39, Luke 12:13– 21, Phil. 2:5–8, Luke 22:14–30, Matt. 23:1–13
Memory Text: “For where jealousy and selfish ambition exist, there will be disorder and every vile practice” (James 3:16, ESV).
(July 10–July 16)
Sunday (Shelley Quinn) - “Jesus Brings Division” Monday (John Dinzey) - “Selfishness” Tuesday (Kenny Shelton) - “Ambition” Wednesday (John Lomacang) - “Hypocrisy” Thursday (Jill Morikone) - “Uprooting Restlessness”
🔴ONLINE SABBATH SCHOOL LESSON https://absg.adventist.org/pdf.php?file=2021:3Q:SE:PDFs:EAQ321_03.pdf
🔗SABBATH SCHOOL PANEL WEBSITE: https://3abnsabbathschoolpanel.com/
🔗SABBATH SCHOOL PANEL PODCAST: https://3abn.org/ssp-podcast.html

media:group.media:title: “Primitive Godliness, Part 6 of 6” - 3ABN Today Family Worship (TDYFW210022)
media:group.media:description:

entry.title: (SDA Sermon) Knowing the Truth is Not Sufficient | Pastor Ryan Day

media:group.media:title: (SDA Sermon) Knowing the Truth is Not Sufficient | Pastor Ryan Day
media:group.media:description:
In this sermon produced by 3ABN, Pastor Ryan Day will share from the Bible how deception is a key issue in our church today. Yes, even the Seventh-day Adventist church. Jesus told us it would happen. Unfortunately knowing the truth is not sufficient. So who's wrong and who's right?
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.
